name: PasseGen

screenshots.caption: Main page with context menu for easy access to account information.

short_description:
{Currently requires Windows Vista or above)

PasseGen generates highly customizable, complex passwords that are impossible to guess and difficult to break. 

Your sensitive information is encrypted and further protected at your discretion (program PIN protection).

Possibly the niftiest feature is the ability to access stored passwords from the main screen via a context menu that pastes this information to your clipboard. (If PIN-protected, this screen is accessed AFTER the log-in interstitial).

Please enjoy, and let me know if there's anything I can do to make your PasseGen experience a better one!

Upcoming Features:
-Verification when saving an identical account name, to prevent accidental account overwrites.
-Improved UI
summary: Password generation, encryption, storage, and easy-access
